basics.name: Tiger Oakes
basics.label: Software Developer
basics.summary: Highly skilled software developer with over 12 years of experience building 3 web browsers, hundreds of open source projects, performant apps, and web standards.

work.name: Microsoft
highlights: Spearheaded UI framework migration by **coordinating designers, product managers, and engineers in 3 orgs** and multiple teams, doubling rendering performance and saving engineering time across all of Microsoft.

Served as **React/TypeScript subject matter expert**—significantly raised standards for performance, accessibility, & internationalization through mentorship, writing automated tools, giving tech talks, writing articles.
Wrote specifications for new Web App Manifest features as member of the **World Wide Web Consortium**.
Removed 1.5 seconds from repeat loads with **IndexedDB** caching and **CSS** performance improvements.

work.name: Mozilla
highlights: Built and shipped brand new web browser in **Kotlin** to **over 100 million users on Google Play Store**.
Served as a **feature lead for Progressive Web App support**, providing a native feel to **thousands of web apps**.
Coordinated with **Google** and **Intel** developers to add maskable icon support to Firefox and Chrome.
Added Trusted Web Activity support to Firefox for Android, **featured in Chrome Dev Summit 2019 keynote**.

work.name: Google
highlights: Designed and built **JavaScript** internal tool to analyze millions of files. The tool was used to **save 30 KB** in the first week after release and avoid limits that would have halted Google Chrome for Android updates.
Used streams and **background threads** to handle 180 MB downloads, rendering partial data **7x faster**.

work.name: Vital Mechanics
highlights: Rendered 3D **WebGL** clothing simulations by interfacing between Electron client and **C++** server.

work.name: Yelp
highlights: Built new web search page feature in **Flow**, **React**, **Redux**, and **Python** displayed to **1 million users monthly**.
Ported **Android** business logic to **Python API** package to serve multiple platforms, later turned into microservice.

work.name: Centre for Sustainable Food Systems at UBC Farm

projects.name: Open Source
highlights: Built Maskable.app, go-to developer tool recommended by Google & CSS Tricks, used **11,000+ times/month**.
Implemented icon features for Google Bubblewrap & Microsoft PWABuilder, used **2,000+ times/month**.
Maintainer for **Rollup** ES6 module bundler, adding **TypeScript types and compiler support** to all plugins.
Created Big Island Buses offline web app with County of Hawai'i, won Congressional App Challenge 2014.

projects.name: Speaking and Writing
highlights: Speaker at **JSConf Budapest 2022**, **CascadiaJS**, and **HalfStack** conferences with thousands of attendees.
Wrote web development articles for **CSS Tricks**, **MDN**, and **web.dev** with thousands of views.
Authored guidebook on **MockK** testing library for **Kotlin** and **Android**, with **20,000+ views/month**.
Wrote React to **Jetpack Compose** Dictionary, resource recommended by Android team to new developers.
Mentoring new software developers through volunteering at Ada Developers Academy.

awards.title: UBC Work Learn International Undergraduate Research Award
Grand Prize: Congressional App Challenge 2014: Hawaii’s 2nd Congressional District
